data.event: The city of Mercedes was founded September 15, 1907, by the American Rio Grande Land & Irrigation Company, and was incorporated March 8, 1909.
The city of Mercedes was founded September 15, 1907, by the American Rio Grande Land & Irrigation Company, and was incorporated March 8, 1909.
It is one of the oldest towns in the Rio Grande Valley, and the city celebrated its centennial in 2007.
